Container.Name: jitsi-jvb
Container.Overview: Jitsi Videobridge image for Jitsi Meet
Container.Description: Jitsi Videobridge image for Jitsi Meet

Config.Name: JVB_PORT
Config.Description: Media port for the Jitsi Videobridge

Config.Name: JVB_TCP_PORT
Config.Description: TCP Fallback for Jitsi Videobridge for when UDP isn’t available

Config.Name: DOCKER_HOST_ADDRESS
Config.Description: IP address of the Docker host, needed for LAN environments

Config.Name: XMPP_AUTH_DOMAIN
Config.Description: Internal XMPP domain for authenticated services

Config.Name: XMPP_INTERNAL_MUC_DOMAIN
Config.Description: XMPP domain for the internal MUC

Config.Name: JVB_AUTH_USER
Config.Description: XMPP user for JVB MUC client connections

Config.Name: JVB_AUTH_PASSWORD
Config.Description: XMPP password for JVB MUC client connections

Config.Name: JVB_BREWERY_MUC
Config.Description: MUC name for the JVB pool

Config.Name: JVB_TCP_HARVESTER_DISABLED
Config.Description: Disable the additional harvester which allows video over TCP (rather than just UDP)

Config.Name: JVB_STUN_SERVERS
Config.Description: STUN servers used to discover the server's public IP

Config.Name: JVB_ENABLE_APIS
Config.Description: Comma separated list of JVB APIs to enable
